channel.title: Cache mapping!
channel.description:
If anyone is online in the next 3 hours that can solve this, i will give you my life :O
Consider a byte-addressable computer with 24-bit addresses, a cache capable of storing a total of 64K (2^16) bytes of data and blocks of 32 bytes (2^5). Show the format of a 24-bit memory address for: a. Direct mapped b. Fully associative c. 4-way set associative

item.title: Cache mapping!
item.dc:creator: @vraptor vraptor

If anyone is online in the next 3 hours that can solve this, i will give you my life

of 64K (2^16) bytes of data and blocks of 32 bytes (2^5). Show the format of a 24-bit memory address for:
a. Direct mapped
